branchCategory.name: IDW
branchCategory.description: <p>The IDW series is a heatless unit that produces atmospheric dew points of -22°F (-30°C) and below, and ISO 8573-1 moisture classes of class 3 and better. Heatless designs alternate between 2 desiccant columns and use a small portion of the dry air from the column in service to regenerate the other column, thus assuring continuous capability of providing dry air.</p>
branchCategory.bullets: <UL> <LI>Inlet flow rates from 4 to 365 scfm in 17 sizes <LI>-40°F / °C pressure dew point standard, can be configured for -100°F / -73°C <LI>Max. inlet air temperature: 122°F / 50°C <LI>Easy to maintain <LI>Connections: NPT threads <LI>For use in North America</LI></UL>

branchItem.name: IDW, Compact Heatless Air Dryer for North American Use
branchItem.description: <p>Regenerative desiccant drying systems provide the greatest level of drying capability amongst widely available drying technologies.  The ID and IDW series are heatless units that produce atmospheric dew points of -22°F (-30°C) and below, and ISO 8573-1 moisture classes of class 3 and better.  Heatless designs alternate between 2 desiccant columns and use a small portion of the dry air from the column in service to regenerate the other column, thus assuring continuous capability of providing dry air.</p>
branchItem.bullets: <UL> <LI>Inlet flow rates from 4 to 365 scfm in 17 sizes <LI>-40°F / °C pressure dew point standard, can be configured for -100°F / -73°C <LI>Max. inlet air temperature: 122°F / 50°C <LI>Easy to maintain <LI>Connections: NPT threads <LI>For use in North America</LI></UL>
